In this unit we will learn how to adopt some advanced techniques in
formulating and solving mathematical programs. You will warm start the solver,
formulate feasible inequalities to tackle symmetry and compute an efficient
frontier for a multi-objective decision making problem.
A brief intro into the problem is given in the pdf file. For all further information refer to the provided notebook.
